fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Cigar Smoke- (Night) Target a player. They are given generic ‘nothing happened’ feedback instead of the feedback they would have received at the end of the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Burn the Evidence! (Passive) [Cheat] Whenever you carry the factional kill, you may choose to use an available Cheat to clean the body.
-Barnburner (Passive) If you are the last living Cog, your Attack and Defense both increase by 1 tier and you may choose one player over the next phase to hit with an Instant Powerful Attack.
